Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019
Author: Sarah
Title: Clean, hotel look and quality!
Body: I was getting tired of my prior decorating in my bathroom. I am a huge fan of the clean, fresh look of hotel bathrooms that are decorated with dark tile and white towels. I ordered these to go with my new white shower curtain. LOVE THEM!They are outstanding quality and wick water very nicely. I hate towels that are ‚Äúfluffy‚Äù and do nothing for taking water away. These towels are thick, heavy, and absorbent! In my opinion they reminded me of the Ritz Carlton towels!Such a great product - 100% recommend.They do not fall apart in washing machine or dryer.Yay - I have a clean, white bathroom!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2019
Author: Joy from Warren, MI
Title: Absorbency and Value
Body: Excellent towels! When I first opened the packaging, I thought they would be thin and cheap. Upon further inspection, the towels fluffed out nicely and I‚Äôm very happy with them! Great value!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
Author: ibhis4ever
Title: Great value
Body: Great value plush soft and luurious towel set. I got the white and the pink and they are better than expected in quality. The pink is more of a dusty rose. Very pleased. Will order more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2019
Author: Judy Schmidt
Title: Sorry do and luxurious!
Body: The towels are luxurious! I washed them right away and they fluffed up to spa quality! They are very soft and absorbent! I was very impressed with the quality for the reasonable price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2019
Author: Angela Dolbear
Title: Excellent towels
Body: These towels are excellent. They are thick, absorbent, and wash well (I have washed them twice, and they still look and feel great.) I bought a second set, and they were just as wonderful as the first set. I will probably buy more. The charcoal grey is a deep beautiful color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2019
Author: Cat lady
Title: Super soft, excellent quality.
Body: Bought this set to use to take to the gym and was surprised at how thick and soft these are. They are a much better quality than some of my others that were much more expensive. Remain soft and adorable after repeated washings.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2019
Author: D. Austin
Title: Disappointing
Body: I bought these due to the good reviews, but these towels are not what I expected. They look and feel cheap. They're fairly thin and not at all plush or luxurious. The labels are cheap and plastic-like. I'm so disappointed. I serious can't understand all the good reviews.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2019
Author: Louise
Title: Good Purchase!
Body: This is a great towel set. They are pretty,a good value, and the bath towels particularly absorbent. A good purchase!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020
Author: Dena S
Title: Unraveling
Body: Wash one time and it is unraveling at the ends. Bought two different sets. Both doing the same thing.Company gave us a full refund after seeing our review. They appear to stay on top of their reviews and product. üëçüèª

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2019
Author: Prime Customer
Title: Good Value!
Body: Nice set of towels. Color is a nice bright white.  They fluff up nice in the dryer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Shredding after one month
Body: Haven‚Äôt even had these towels a month & they‚Äôre already shredding. There are only two of us & we have 6 other towels so these have hardly been used in the time we‚Äôve had them. Really frustrating & I would not recommend these even though it seems like a ‚Äúbang for your buck‚Äù kind of deal.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Seam Came Undone During Second Wash...
Body: These towels looked nice when they arrived, but after the second wash one of the seams has come unstitched leaving a loop of fabric on the larger towel, and several of the other towels are fraying.  I don't think my washing machine is to blame - I've had other towels for years without ever having an issue like this.Love the color, but I'm disappointed in the quality of these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
Author: Torina Kinlaw
Title: Just as described
Body: I love these towels,  they are thick and absorbent.  They dry well and they're the perfect size.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2019
Author: Christina Myslenski
Title: TERRIBLE! Don't waste your money.
Body: SO disappointed with these towels.  I wanted to get nice towel sets for each of our bathrooms and relied heavily on the product reviews and the "Amazon Choice" banner in the search results for quality towel sets.  I washed them before use as directed.  When I pulled them out of the dryer,  some were already fraying and there were stings and loose ends all over the place.  Then I used one of the bath towels and had white fuzzies EVERYWHERE. I had to shower again to get them all off. I'm definitely going to be seeking a refund.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
Author: Star
Title: Don‚Äôt buy
Body: Don‚Äôt like these towels they r poor quality.  They r thick but shed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
Author: Dylan
Title: They start pilling after one wash cycle
Body: The towels start to fall apart after washing them once or twice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
Author: Mellah
Title: Horrible bath towels!
Body: I don't understand why all the good reviews.  I was looking to gift these but they are so thin and rough I would be embarrassed to give them as gifts!  These are NOT soft and feel incredibly cheap!  Returning these and will be purchasing a better set elsewhere.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2019
Author: Dorene Mullins
Title: Didn‚Äôt make it through initial wash ...
Body: Out of the package and into the wash before use resulted in hemline coming undone.  Wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
Author: Ruth Wilkins
Title: Not "luxury"
Body: These towels are not as thick and plush as they should be for their price and description.  They are average thickness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
Author: Randy A. Gordon
Title: REALLY??? First impressions mean everything!
Body: Okay, I hope the company gets back to me ASAP! I want to give these a better rating and hope to. Came flat as well you know! Instructions say they "WILL" fluff after the first washing. Okay, but can they then be returned if I am not satisfied? "FIRST IMPRESSION" - I guess they were vacuum packed so they are FLAT! Then there is a smell? I hope that washes out?  "FIRST IMPRESSION" - Now the BIGGIE!!! Two large pulls in one of the large towels.  "FIRST IMPRESSION" - Do I return these to get another set of the same thing? I would clip and use but would likely have an unraveling towel that I would then own and could NOT use! Afraid to wash and dry... Guess they must go back... Looking for a GREAT set of towels so I can then get another set or two to replenish our bathroom closet. It needs help... Are these it? Not on  "FIRST IMPRESSION"!!!
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Fuzz nightmares
Body: I‚Äôve washed these a couple of times now but they continue to pill and when I use them, I‚Äôm covered in a layer of fuzz which is annoying when I try to apply lotion.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
Author: Kenny D.
Title: Great towels
Body: I struggled with ordering these after reading reviews and looking at the pictures.I was looking for towels for months. I was afraid to buy without actually touching them. I decided to buy a set of these towels. The bath towels are large enough to wrap around your body. The hand towels are a pretty standard size. The washcloths are a litter bit larger than others I have had in the past.These are soft and fluffy towels. But not overly so. I am not a fan of the overly soft and fluffy towels. I feel like they don't really dry you. My personal preference. I like a towel that dries you, I look for absorbency.The set I bought has none if the issues I saw 8n other reviews. They are not leaving fuzz behind. I washed before I used them and they were just fine. I do not have fuzz all over myself or the bathroom.  They are not covering everything in fuzz when I wash them. (I do only wash towels together ) I have the dark grey (not as dark as I had hoped, but acceptable) and I have washed them with white towels and they did not bleed.I am happy enough with these towels I will be ordering more soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
Author: Sandra Z.
Title: Thin towels
Body: From the photo and reviews I thought these would be thick, fluffy towels. I was so disappointed at how thin they are, that I didn't even take them out of the plastic bag. They are going back. Our 10 year old towels are thicker than these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2020
Author: jeffrey frey
Title: Most expensive clean up rags ever!! DONT BUY!!!
Body: Super cheap quality! When I opened the package the towels were already falling apart and then when I washed them, on delicate!! They literally just came apart.  Bought all the sets and it seriously was the biggest mistake ever.  Basically spent a couple hundred on some raggedy so towel clean up rags.  Picts attached are from pulling towels out of plastic packaging and the first wash on delicate mode.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR $$$

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2019
Author: jim bloodgood
Title: Would not buy again
Body: Cheap product but it was sold at a low cost. Quality is hard to tell online.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2019
Author: K. Jacob
Title: Not as advertised
Body: Product sheds 1/3 of it's weight in the 1st wash! Definitely not luxury...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
Author: E Marcelino
Title: Messy messy!
Body: These towels are driving me crazy! I‚Äôve washed them 4 times on hot, still bleeding color heavy. Washed another 2 times on cold with baking soda, still bleeding color. Every time I try to dry my hands they are left stuck with fuzzies. I‚Äôve tried every trick I can find online. After 8 washes now, still loads of fuzzies and color bleeding.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2019
Author: Donna WK
Title: Great decision to make this purchase!
Body: I was leery about purchasing this towel set without knowing the brand or feeling the material.  But, I am glad I made the decision to buy it.  I immediately washed the set in cold water with a cup of white vinegar and detergent, NO liquid fabric softener (I have learned that liquid softener has a tendency to weaken material) and dried with a sheet softener.  There was no lint in the drier. Folding the set was affirmation that I made the right decision.  They were fluffy, soft and absorb well.  They feel like actual towels, not like the micro-fiber materials that leaves you feeling damp.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2020
Author: An
Title: A must buy!
Body: I bought this towel set and wasn't sure what to expect but I have bought towels from Amazon before so I had high hopes. This towel set is great! The softness and absorbency is awesome! I'm used to brand new towels needing to be washed multiple multiple times in order to get rid of the non absorbent overly soft feel. These towels are absorbent and soft at the same time after just the initial first wash. They recommend not using fabric softener which I followed their instructions. Just washed and dried and boom soft fluffy hotel style towels. This color is particularly nice as well. I think the value for the money is great too. I've paid this amount for much less towel at Bed Bath and Beyond or even Target. To get a whole set for only $35 is a great deal and the quality is great. If you're on the fence about these towels don't be they're great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
Author: On Track
Title: Not The Best
Body: First wash and dry I followed the instructions. In the dryer the brand new towels left so many CLUMPS AND LINT, multiple handfuls, they were practically DISINTEGRATING. Afterwards they had LOOSE THREADS from being poorly sewn, loads of them, and it took me a long time to cut each of them off carefully. Washcloths are so THIN I can see a lot of light coming through them.Used them for a couple of weeks. Was surprised that they are NOT VERY ABSORBENT and that they don't dry you off very well.Though they're affordable and soft, given that they DON'T DRY YOU OFF VERY WELL, I view these as nearly a total bust and I decided to return them.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2019
Author: Tracy Y.
Title: Good enough for the price but not good enough for my expectation from the reviews
Body: Very disappointed after reading all these positive reviews about how fluffy and absorbing it is. It is not really that absorbing especially the small ones for wiping the water on the counter because it always leaves water strikes on the table counter or mirror and I was hoping it to be able to wipe everything DRY. It is not even close to the fluffiness of my $35 towel but considering the price, I‚Äôll give it a three star.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019
Author: DG
Title: Towels are So Soft
Body: They are very soft and bright white.  I ordered white towels because I want to be able to wash them in hot water and use bleach when needed.  The seller claims they can be bleached safely to maintain their appearance and prevent that mildew smell.  I haven't had to wash them yet but I have used them once or twice so far and I can tell you they are very soft and fluffy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
Author: Lynn M. Killam
Title: They will not stop balling up & shedding!
Body: I have washed these towels countless times in hopes that they would stop balling up & shedding. I have had these for several months & there has been no change. When I try to dry myself off I end up covered with red fuzzy balls from the towel. They are all in my hair & all over me. When I wash them, I have to wash them separately because anything else gets covered with pieces of red fuzz that is nearly impossible to pick off! I honestly can't use them for anything! I want to send them back but I see the window for doing that is closed. I am so frustrated with the fact that these were advertised as "Luxury" towels. They have made me nothing but miserable & irritated!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: markle
Body: I would probably offer a five star rating for this product at this price point except for one thing. There was a quality control issue. Though the towels seem to be of good quality one of my towels was improperly sewn down the side and frayed on the first washing which I did as directed before I used them. I read reviews on these towels that I do disagree with though. One being that they put off alot of fuzz. After the first wash yes I did have that issue but since the second wash they have been fine. They also feel pretty course out of the package but if washed and dried as directed before use they are great. I would recommend this product and will probably buy more hoping I was just unlucky with the one that frayed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good quality
Body: Very nice and heavy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
Author: Wing T of Virginia
Title: UPDATE ON MY ORIGINAL REVIEW
Body: Below is my original review of this product.  After receiving the original shipment, I wrote a negative review.  Then I was contacted by the White Classic company.  They apologized for the faulty hand towel and voluntarily agreed to replace the set.  Why I did not ask for the whole set to be replaced, they offered me a complete set to compensate for the original defective towel.  I was surprised and pleased that they were eager to compensate me.  I received my replacements today and they are defect free.  I commend the company for their customer service and will now change my rating from a one star to a five.  The towels are very nice and soft.  I recommend this product and especially the Customer Service unit.BELOW IS MY ORIGINAL REVIEW>>>>I ordered the set of Classic Luxury Grey Towels.  One of the hand towels was defective.  Stitching on edge was frayed and unsightly.  Cannot be used due to fraying.  I am very disappointed in this product.  I expected more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
Author: evanstc
Title: Thick 100% cotton, good value
Body: The reviews are really good for these towels and the price is great so I decided to give them a try and I ordered five sets. They come packaged tightly but we‚Äôre pretty thick coming out of the packaging but not super thick. I decided to see how thick and fluffy they could be after washing. I washed one set in warm water, no fabric softener, and dried them. I folded them and opened a second set and compared the washed thickness to the thickness straight out of the package. Big difference! They really fluff up a lot when you wash them. One set produces a handful of lint. I‚Äôm anxious to see if that continues but I hope it doesn‚Äôt. I deducted one star because they did feel a bit softer straight out of the package. That‚Äôs probably due to the sizing chemicals that are often applied to towels to make them feel soft but always washes out. Overall I am very pleased. A little weird that they‚Äôre made in Pakistan.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
Author: Elena Wojciechowski
Title: Poor product but helpful customer service.
Body: When these first arrived they looked ok but they already were running and had threads hanging out. No biggie, can happen with any packaging. But they weren‚Äôt soft or very absorbent and it felt like I was just wiping the water onto different parts of my body. I wasn‚Äôt going to write a review until I was showering today and I get out and use one of the towels and oh man. There was so much lint. I‚Äôm not exaggerating, my whole body was covered in thin little gray strands. And no matter what I did I couldn‚Äôt get them off with the towel. So yeah, don‚Äôt buy these ‚Äúluxury‚Äù towels.Update: Customer service reached out to me and offered me a partial refund or a replacement. I chose the replacement and was excited when they came. Unfortunately, when I opened them I noticed right away that, once again there were runs and threads hanging off, the quality felt poor, and when I used them they left grey fuzz all over me. I‚Äôm including pictures of the replacement towels that came. Changing my rating from one to three stars SOLELY BECAUSE OF CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2020
Author: LuvPlantsNC
Title: These aren‚Äôt it.
Body: I was very disappointed to see that the quality of the towels was very poor.  The brand new towels had runs in them, loose strings everywhere, and were coming apart at the seams. I bought a newly identical set of towels in navy blue but they were made in Turkey. The towels made in turkey are some of the best house I‚Äôve never on quality of construction is outstanding.  THESE towels are made in Pakistan and I noticed 6 separate runs in them right after opening,  What a waste of time and money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
Author: Ronnie
Title: More mint than sage/Follow washing directions
Body: Overall a good towel, for the money. Of you follow the washing directions you won't have the mishaps others have had. Obviously it's hard to get the color to show exactly the right shade, but I would say the towels I received we're more of a mint green than a sage.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2020
Author: bb
Title: the worst!
Body: These are the WORST towels I have ever purchased! Your mention of washing separately because of possible lint needs to be reworded to:Wash separately because A LOT of lint that will clog your washer and dryer! Also the lint will get on rugs, counters and body after use. The red lint will also stain your grout if it gets wet. Lint will continue to appear after every wash!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2019
Author: Patricia Carson
Title: Quality purchase
Body: Nice and doesn‚Äôt get you all full of lint!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2020
Author: Debbie Phillips
Title: Color was spot on!
Body: I wanted a spa like atmosphere and the color of these towels do just that. Beautiful!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
Author: Melissa Pappas
Title: Nice!
Body: Nice towel set! Bought 3 more after trying the first set ou!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2019
Author: Debbie Swartz
Title: Very Poor quality
Body: No matter the cost of an item, the purchaser should be able to count on the product description and customer ratings.  I opened the box of "Luxury" towels to find low budget cheaply made towels. They are thin, rough and poorly stitched. After washing in cold water, seams frayed and the towels were even more scratchy.  The would be great for cleaning the garage.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2019
Author: Neicy
Title: Very poor quality terrible disappointment
Body: I received my order and washed and dried towels separately as instructed on label.  I was so disappointed towel was so cheaply made that the threading came apart after 1st wash.  I plan to return or request better replacement.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2019
Author: SHWilson
Title: Great towels
Body: Changed the color scheme in the bathroom to chocolate and turquoise.  The chocolate towels are perfect. Nice and thick, absorbent and soft. I washed them before using, lots of lint in dryer, cleaned screen twice but towels came out very soft and absorbent. I definitely recommend these towels.  I wish they came in turquoise or a teal color.  I had to use a different brand for the turquoise and they are nice but not as thick.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
Author: Nic TheDragonSlayer
Title: Avoid!!
Body: The towel isn't as thick as I expected. The first time I washed the towel it unraveled and tore apart. If you need a towel to wash your car or rags to clean your house then buy them. If you are looking for QUALITY towels for personal use, don't buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Yes
Body: YES, dexent towels at a decent price.  As an adult, you should know not to wash towels with dissimilar items like black shirts or blue jeans. I made that mistake once in my youth. Hotel towels vary, but these are definitely an improvement iver the smorgasbord of towels I had. Bought 2 sets, only washed them twice so far and no problems. Don't read too many reviews, or you'll never be satisfied enough to make a choice. Just my $0.02

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
Author: rural lady
Title: good for price
Body: This towel set was very good for the price.  I hoped they would have been a little thicker but the color was just what I needed so happy about that.  I also found there to be a lot of attached  loose thread ends on the towels, especially on the corners of the wash clothes and hand towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2019
Author: Shara Atkinson
Title: Great customer service!
Body: I don't expect perfection, but I do expect good customer service.  When I had an issue with my purchase, this seller stepped up and made things right for me.I would buy from them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
Author: Daniel Fleming
Title: Good Product, but
Body: It a fine towel in all features but one. It leaves a lot of lint. In our case it's red lint.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2019
Author: JDK
Title: very nice for the price
Body: Large , very soft towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
Author: Gregg Morris
Title: Great customer service from White Classic
Body: White Classic and a support manager named Olivia have given me hope that world hasn't totally gone to hell in a hand basket! I ordered a set of these towels in pink and grey last Monday. They arrived Wednesday. usual great Prime service. I washed and dried them per the directions and the pink bath towels were not soft and absorbent once washed and dried. The hand towel and wash cloths were. And, the grey set was wonderfull As advertised. My wife tried the pink set and said they were scratchy like sand paper but absorbent. I went to the White Classic website and filled out and Contact Us form detailing the problem and asking their advice - return to Amazon, etc. I also filled out their warranty form. (Yes, they come with a 2 year warranty!). The next morning an email from Olivia, their support manager, was awaiting me. Very nice. Very professional. Whatever would make life easier. Return to Amazon. Get a refund from White Classic. Get a replacement from White Classic. I opted for the replacement from White Classic. I was only expecting the 2 towels but this morning (Sunday no less!) USPS delivers an entire pink replacement package. I washed and dried them and they are every bit as soft and absorbent as the grey set was. A great product and even greater customer service. I'll buy a lot more of these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
Author: Linda G.
Title: Soft and Absorbent
Body: I first noticed this bath towel set for the currently hard to find burgundy color. The color is very vibrant and as pictured by the seller.  The towels are soft, plush, and very absorbent. My experience with towel purchase is that the towels that are heavy and tightly bound are not soft nor absorbent.  The lighter weight towels do not hold up well in the laundry of them and some snag easily.  This Classic Luxury Towel Set is neither too heavy nor too light but just the right combination of plushness and absorbency.  I was pleased with my purchase and the price did not break the bank.  .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
Author: lost in space
Title: Did I receive the same towels?
Body: I bought these after reading reviews here that they were soft, thick and luxurious.  They're not.  These definitely don't resemble the main photos in the Amazon ad.  They're thin, run-of-the-mill towels that I could find at any Walmart or Target store at a low price.  I would estimate that these will last a little over a year before they'll need to be replaced.  I don't like leaving negative reviews, but these were a disappointment.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
Author: GaffMom
Title: Wonderful Towels for a affordable price!
Body: I'm always a little hesitant when buying stuff like towels that aren't over priced because they always seem to be extremely cheap material and fall apart easily. So far this has been the opposite experience with these towels. They are super soft, hold the water after a shower, a bath and even after bathing a corgi! My husband was pleasantly surprised as well. Would recommend these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2019
Author: Richard A Hitchcock
Title: Lint was awfully heavy off towels in first washing
Body: If you are going to wash these towels for the first time DO NOT WASH with anything else as they shed heavy lint  , see pictures. Towels are not as fluffy or thick  as I thought they would be and the loss of the cotton in form of lint was considerable. Absorbency has not been tested yet.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
Author: Sue Stuck
Title: Good value for the money
Body: The towel set included 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels, and 4 wash cloths and it was nice having the additional wash cloths. I'm completely happy with my choice of this towel set, so much so that I have ordered 3 more sets.  I just wish there was a matching bath mat set.  I read somewhere that that will be offered soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2020
Author: Liza Rose
Title: Beautiful Towels
Body: The cranberry color is beautiful, very vibrant. They are so absorbent and quick drying. They came in one day, with a warranty and washing instructions.I won‚Äôt hesitate to buy more at such an affordable price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2020
Author: Aaron S.
Title: The color dye is running out of the towels
Body: No we did not bleach these all we did was wash our hands and dryer hands and wash our face... No bleach or cleaner touch these all the colors gone something's wrong with them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
Author: Aimee Buckley
Title: Falls Apart After 1 Wash!
Body: I washed these before use and they left a ridiculous amount of lint/strands all over my washing machine and after I dried them every towel had started to unravel in at least one section and had strands coming off. I returned them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
Author: Gregory S Boggs
Title: Unraveled after first wash
Body: Unraveled after first wash. Returned for a refund. Not what I was expecting with all the great reviews.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Poor quality
Body: These towels fell apart in the washer... after the first wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2019
Author: James Van Royan
Title: Like a luxury hotel towel
Body: I was looking for a towel just like in a luxury hotel. Found it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2019
Author: Meline Arakelyan
Title: It's not 8 it's 6
Body: I got only 6 pc. I don't kmow how can I write to them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2019
Author: Katy Bercume
Title: Dryer Lint Trap Filler
Body: These are great towels.  They are thick and very absorbent however, they do leave a lot of lint in your dryers lint trap.  I have laundered these twice now and the lint trap is literally FULL to OVERFLOWING!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2019
Author: CH
Title: What a Rip-off
Body: Directions:  Wash to fluff up. Washed, Dried.  No Fluff.  Thin, thin, rough towels.  Hand towels paper thin. One towel came unstitched at the top seam.  Costco towels thicker, fluffier, softer.  Returning. Don't waste your time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
Author: Lana
Title: gave it as a gift
Body: A friend of mine mentioned she needed new towels and I bought them for her for her birthday. She loved them and said they were great. I haven't seen them, but she is very happy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
Author: MatthewGB
Title: Nice and fluffy
Body: So far I‚Äôm pretty impressed, I bought 3 sets which arrived today and unpacking these felt really substantial though obviously pretty flat. I laundered them fairly quickly and they came out exactly how they should, fluffy and soft enough that my cat needed in on the folding action. Obviously on the first wash there‚Äôs a fair amount of lint left behind. One thing people don‚Äôt know about lint on new towels is it‚Äôs actually fibers that get statically attracted to them through manufacturing, washing breaks down the static and releases the fibers Which then fills up your lint trap. It‚Äôs early days for a full review but so far I‚Äôm happy.. UPDATE. After multiple washes the towels are still soft and fluffy. The washcloths though are considerably thinner, which suggests the thread count is significantly inferior to the towels. I‚Äôm still overall happy with the purchase but it‚Äôs a cheap move.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
Author: Readersaurus
Title: Good towels
Body: Despite the manufacturer's promise to give me 12 free wash cloths for writing this review, these are good towels.  They are absorbent, but they also dry quickly in the dryer and on the rack.  They are thin enough to dry the outer ear but thick enough.  I've only had them for a few days but they are a welcome relief from our previous "luxury" towels which were too thick and took forever to dry in the dryer.  I would buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020
Author: jenny
Title: NOT QUALITY TOWELS! Severe product inconsistency between colors
Body: These are NOT quality towels. Photo above is shown after the FIRST wash, straight from the package. I only washed the towels with the other brand new towels, and this was the result. I purchased four sets of the brown and light green/sage towels, and there are definite quality flaws between the sets and inconsistent ‚Äúquality‚Äù even between colors. The brown towels are already frayed and snagged within one month of purchase, they have horrendous fuzzies that transfer onto the skin and they tend to just smear the water on the skin instead of absorbing into the towel. The green/sage color is nowhere near the  ‚Äúquality‚Äù of the brown towels. They are not near as soft or plush, however they do absorb the water better and do not have the fuzzies. There are multiple, multiple mixed reviews on this site regarding these towels, however this perfectly reflects the inconsistency between the products and the colors of the towels. I hope that I am able to return these as these are not going to last or even look nice much past the first wash.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
Author: Tessie
Title: Good value, soft and sturdy
Body: We needed more towels when two family members came to stay with us during the quarantine spring. I ordered these because they looked to be the best reviewed and the best value for the money. And they would get here quickly. They totally lived up to my expectations and I would order another set if I needed them! I liked ordering white in case I needed to bleach them because one family member is notorious for wiping their make up on their bath towel haha but I haven‚Äôt bleached them yet so I can‚Äôt attest to how they hold up to that.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
Author: R. Twitchell
Title: Buyer beware!!! DO NOT BUY!
Body: This product is garbage!! DO NOT BUY! This happened after one wash where the hand towels and bath towels are falling a part!Both hand towels are coming unraveled at the seems. The bath towels are also damaged and falling apart after one wash. The color drastically faded.I have had my Martha Stewart bath set for 8 years and they do not show this kind of wear and tear.I order weekly from Amazon and depend on these reviews.  Do not buy these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
Author: Penngal
Title: Very nice towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
Author: Arleen
Title: Wow!  Great towels.  Great Value.  Great service.
Body: My family was in need of new, just so towels.  You know, trying to replace great towels that had become like old friends.  I thought these would do the trick and be soft, fluffy, the right size, color, and design.  I purchased five sets.  They washed well and during a blind touch test my husband was convinced they were a big improvement over our old, worn, towels.  Having TWO wash cloths for every set is perfect for him because he puts one in the shower and the other at his sink.Out of twenty wash cloths, one wasn't sewn perfectly and believe it or not the company answered my Christmas Day mail making things right.  Not only that, there is a TWO YEAR WARRANTY!Whee ha!  The Happy Campers Family

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
Author: BubbleBlower
Title: Everything you need in a towel set for a great price!
Body: White towels are always a crisp, clean look in a bathroom...we needed some towels for a new rental and I searched several places for an absorbent towel that looks good and doesn‚Äôt break the bank.  This set was ideal! I bought one set to try,  with the intention of purchasing more if they met my criteria.  Some towels are actually too thick or too thin, or leave white fluff or aren‚Äôt absorbing....I think the towels will soften more over time, but I like that they give a gentle buffing action when drying. These  towels are exactly what I was looking for...time to buy more!

It takes an average of wiping the towel over my arms 4 times before there is no water film left on my arms or any other part of my body. The need to be left on the floor to absorb any water. I quick wipe with just create a smeared mess. Very disappointed in this purchase. Was gone on vacation when they had arrived. Wish I could have returned these and just bought Walmart towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
Author: Nancy
Title: Do not waste your time--NOT $70 towels! You can do much better at multiple places!
Body: Wow--what a disappointment these towels are!  They are indeed packaged beautifully--but $70 towels they are NOT.  Towels were covered in multiple pulls from the git-go. I had to painstakingly and carefully clip with scissors throughout.  Filled up my dryer lint container to capacity with the first washing--something I have never seen happen before (i.e., all that "fluffiness" comes right out in the form of discarded lint).  I had company coming the next day and only made these discoveries upon washing the towels in preparation for their arrival.  BUT I am RETURNING the unopened sets.  And since ordering, I have stopped in to several local big box discount stores--and believe me, you can do MUCH BETTER at any one of them.  Shame on this vendor for marketing these towels in this way.  WHAT a disappointment the products I received are!

The red set washed up soft and fluffy but the package that was a combination of white and gray seem to be of a totally different quality. They were rough and did not wash up fluffy. Wondering if two different manufacturers made this.?not pleased.

Author: Wendy
Title: Great towel choice
Body: When purchasing new towels like most consumers I am very picky and leery of product descriptions, and customer reviews. You never quite know if they are true to the product, and or written by the seller themself. I can tell you that I am not the seller, nor do I know them. The towel set came last week, and immediately I threw it into the washer, then dryer following the recommendation to not use fabric softeners. There was far less lint in the dryer trap than with new towel purchases before. The stiffness from the shipping disappeared. The color held true as well. We began using the towel set that night. My husband who generally hates new towels was very pleased. I was as well. The bath towel is the perfect size, and is very absorbent. My husband likened it to a car sham. The hand towels are equally as nice. They are large enough to wrap around your head of wet hair. I will probably order another set soon.

The towels are a nice size, they are high quality, bleach doesn‚Äôt kill them, wash great, and keep their softness. I‚Äôve washed and bleached mine over 8 times now :-)

Title: How it will hold up

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
Author: Jazz
Title: Towels are big and thick.
Body: When I opened the towels I was so surprised they were so big and felt thick. I got them on sale and they were definitely worth the money. The bath towel is a lot bigger than regular bath towels I have bought. They washed good with no bleeding or fading when washed. They dried well and seems to absorb a lot after a shower. I really like these towels and will definitely buy them again when I need towels or for a great present for newlyweds. Thanks, Elsie

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
Author: BIG AL CHICAGO
Title: You Can Towel Down Easily!
Body: Update: It's been almost five months since my purchase. They are still in great shape after daily use and wash a set once a week. Glad I purchased them.I was very pleased with the purchase of these towels. I washed them and use them after I got out of the shower. They are very absorbent and very soft. I am very pleased with this purchase. I would recommend purchasing these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
Author: Susie Que Vinski
Title: Quality
Body: Quick shipment. I have only washed them once but they turned out soft plush and lint free.  The color green is beautiful, so far I really like them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2019
Author: dominic
Title: Nice material but cheaply made?
Body: After a single wash, threading from multiple areas around the towels came undone and looks terrible. The material is very nice so I‚Äôm not sure if I got a bad set or if they are just cheaply made. Very unfortunate because the material is really nice and absorbs well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
Author: MakerMelton
Title: Lint Reviews Are True
Body: My first impression of these towels wasn't super positive because they seemed coarse and flat, but after washing they totally changed, so don't let the initial impression get in the way of washing them because they will fluff and soften up.That being said, there was quite a bit of lint in my dryer screen after drying, so when reviews talk about there being a lot of lint after the first drying, they ain't lying.While I haven't used them yet (I'll update after use) I was disappointed with the color difference between the photos and the actual product. I bought the grey, which is actually lighter than it looks in the photos and has an almost greenish tint to them. Color is not a deal breaker for me, but if I could go back, I'd go with a darker gray.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2020
Author: Izzy
Title: Very absorbent - had to order more!
Body: I needed a new set of towels for guest restrooms for the holidays - I saw this bundle (which was a really good price) and decided to order pack of 4 towels as additional. I LOVE these towels! I tried one just to see how they felt, and they are super absorbent. After showering, you only need to wipe once and all the water gets absorbed into the towel. The only thing is-- it tends to hold on to moisture, so the towel seems to stay wet longer (but it could be the winter weather, or the fact that it is actually taking in more moisture than other towels?)You need to wash it when you first get it - it does get significantly fluffier once you wash & dry (don't judge by how it comes out of packaging). I have washed these towels only about 4 times so I haven't had any issues with threads coming apart (only time will tell) but with 2 year warranty, I know I made the right choice buying these. I think I will start to slowly replace all of our home towels with these. Definitely will be buying more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
Author: Lucca Brasi
Title: Excellent customer / Warranty service
Body: My first impression of these towels were not favorable. After the first washing (according to the attached washing instructions) I was surprised to see the border stitching unravelling; very disappointing.I immediately sent an email to the company. They very quickly responded back and offered either a refund or replacement. I chose replacement, and I received my new set of towels in a few days.. They even followed up with and e-mail to see if I received the replacements.After about 3 wash cycles on the new towels, I am happy to report no more quality issues. These towels are fairly thick and soft.  No issues with absorbency that other reviewers mention, they dry my body quickly. Plus, they dry very quickly in the sunlight, or a towel rack...My purchase came with an extended 2 year warranty card if you register online..All in all, I am very satisfied with these towels, and would order again.. It's a comfort to know the company stands by their products..

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
Author: Lindy Danielle Vititow
Title: DO NOT BUY!!! Look at pics! Trust me I am saving you from so much irritation!!!
Body: UNBELIEVABLE!!!! In the worst way! Bought this set and washed twice BEFORE using following their care instructions in cold water. Used one towel after one wash and dry (followed product care instructions) AND nothing worse than getting out of the shower and drying off and having navy lint all over your body, face and hair! Washed and dryed all a third time ( flowing product care instructions) and look at pics of ALL the lint after third dry!!!! Crazy! Plus all but one have never been used. PLUS after first wash it was sadly enough of all loose threads that have NEVER happened to any other laundry washed and dryer in sane appliances! Then look at color in pics after third wash unused and in cold water! They were navy!!! My mind is blown, I have never experienced anything like this in my life and craziest amount of lint ever! Let me be the idiot for buying these and learn from my mistake in buying these!  Pissed!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
Author: Madisha
Title: Not worth the money
Body: Bought these because I wanted some nice, dark gray towels. Bought based off other reviews that said they were soft and nice like hotel towels. I can only assume people who said that were either working for the company or they've stayed at some really low budget hotels because these were thinner than the cheap ones you can get at Walmart. One towel already is coming apart after one wash and we have a brand new washing machine. Will see if I can get a refund because these are totally not worth the money. Just go to Walmart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
Author: MPW
Title: Excellent customer service, great towels & great value!
Body: This was my third order in under a year for towels sets with this company. This time, a towel frayed along the length of the towel at the 1st wash. I contacted customer service and they were very responsive to the problem. They offered two options to rectify the situation. The replacement was received in under 3 days. I had no problems with fraying when washing the replacement. These towels are extremely soft and fluff up beautifully once they are washed. Anyone who complains about the lack of softness definitely needs to make sure they have washed the towels at least once as called for in the directions that are included with the set. I feel they are excellent towels, reasonably priced, and the exceptional customer service when I did experience an issue with the third order was superb. I would definitely recommend and purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
Author: Brooklyn
Title: Thick but.......
Body: I selected grey. The color was rich, the towels are plush, but after the first wash (I use Gain he; no bleach nor added boosters), the color faded to a lighter greyish-olive, and they came out of the dryer with lots of pulls and strings dangling. I do like these towels, but they are no longer the color I needed and I have to spend 40 minutes trimming strings before folding and putting them away. It's unfortunate because the quality of thickness and feel is excellent!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
Author: Sarah
Title: Shed HORRIBLY for a year. Do not recommend.
Body: These shed TERRIBLY‚Äîafter almost a year of owning (didn‚Äôt know I could still leave a review/kept thinking after a certain number of washes would change). I ordered in burgundy, and have washed them dozens of times and hung to dry, and my entire body is COVERED in red when I‚Äôm done drying off from a shower. When I use toner with a cotton ball on my face‚Äîagain‚Äîit‚Äôs covered in red pieces of thread that came off the towel. My hairbrush is covered in red pieces of thread, from towel drying my hair. It‚Äôs the worst. They‚Äôre perpetually falling apart. Definitely do not recommend

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
Author: Chuck P.
Title: Excellent, but fair
Body: I bought FOUR sets of these towels.  They are wonderfully large and soft.  Unfortunately, one of the bath towels from the Green set and the both hand towels from the Aqua set had poor hem stitching and rather than return individual items from the sets (if possible OR replace the whole set) I chose to make minor repairs and keep the towels.  The rest of the towels were fine - but this is the reason for the 4 stars.  These are good towels, but they need better quality control.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
Author: Amy J
Title: The only towels I‚Äôm every buying again
Body: These are amazing!  They are soft and not just fluffy after being washed they‚Äôre so soft and plush all the time.  They absorb great.  We‚Äôve washed the first set 3 or 4 times now and they‚Äôre still just as soft as the day they arrived!  I bought a set, used them and went back for another set.  I threw away two sets from JC Penney that were only 4 months old because these are so awesome and priced great.  I will only every buy these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2020
Author: BP09
Title: Compared to other towel sets at similar prices, these do not absorb well at all.
Body: After running these through a wash to get them clean, I was looking forward to a new towel set that I could continue buying. These will be going to the guest bathroom as they don't absorb well. After toweling off from a shower, my skin still felt really damp, almost to the point where I wouldn't want to put clothes on yet until I air dried some more.  Going to the towel and shaking it off, the water that it did remove was easily flung off, indicating that it hadn't really soaked into the fibers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020
Author: Rex Square
Title: Great towels!
Body: I was surprised at the quality of these towels, they are thick yet easier to dry compared to other similar thickness towels. Two extra washcloths are a bonus too. Only a drawback was there were some pieces of tiny thread (either blue, gray, or black) stuck inside the textile. I thought it was a stein and got upset at first, but figured out I could pull them out. It was a bit troublesome but I was able to take most out. If you have a similar issue, I'd recommend looking closer. I think it won't be a problem with other colors; mine was white. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
Author: I Drank WHAT?!
Title: WELL worth the money paid
Body: After my first shipment of these went missing, (I blame the ''Rona) I got these and almost immediately chucked them in the washer. NOW, I have purchased other towels and frankly, they don't measure up. I believe it's the non-use of fabric softener on these towels is what makes the difference. One of the other reasons I picked these towels is because I bought the black version and when I washed them the first time, the colors DID. NOT. RUN. I would HIGHLY recommend these to anyone looking for a premium quality towel for a budgeted price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2020
Author: David Kohl
Title: Poor Workmanship
Body: I temper this review with the reality that the towel set cost only $35 on Amazon. My initial impressions are that the towels are moderately absorbent, but otherwise soft and of a good thickness. But while the towels seem otherwise to functions as intended, I was disappointed to see the defective stitching right out of the package. Photos are of a hand towel and a washcloth. There were a few less egregious defects on other towels.  At the end of the day, I guess you've got to just realize that you get what you pay for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
Author: R. Henderson
Title: Amazing Customer Service!
Body: First, let me say I washed these towels twice.  Always separately.  The second time I noticed blotches on both bath towels.  I contacted customer service and my towels were immediately replaced.  I am truly impressed with this company.  The towels are absorbent but not necessarily fluffy.  It is very difficult to have fluffy and absorbent in the same towel.  With that being said, this company stands behind their product.  In this day and age, that is a rare commodity.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2020
Author: Bubbysmom
Title: Better Than What I Had
Body: UPDATE:  10/24/20: LINT, LINT, LINT and more LINT!UPDATE: 9/29/20:  DO NOT BUY THESE TOWELS.  I currently have two bath towels that have come unsewn.  I also have one hand towel that‚Äôs snagged.  They still leave a TON of lint everywhere.  NOTE:  These are only being used by my husband and myself.  I might understand the wear and tear if they were in the kids‚Äô bathroom.  I‚Äôm already out of the return window.Pros: 1.  I have beautiful, fresh, new fluffy towels.2.  These towels were a reasonable price.3.  I appreciate the matching hotel-style bath mats.Cons:1.  One of my four bath towels was coming unsewn at one corner after the first wash.2.  These towels are not very absorbent.3.  LINT!  Lint, lint, lint, lint, LINT!  There is burgundy lint covering every surface in my home.  These towels have been washed many times now (I washed everything twice before putting them in my bathroom), and they still leave burgundy lint everywhere.  I get lint in my eyes when I dry my face and when I put in my contact lenses.I bought the same towels in khaki for my boys‚Äô bathroom.  They‚Äôve been great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020
Author: Steve Grubbs
Title: Pretty, but definitely not Luxury
Body: These towels are pretty, and I like the white for a change in my bathroom, but there is nothing luxurious about them. They are like hotel standard towels, and by hotel I mean Travelodge not the Hilton. They're not towels you'd want to steal. They do the job as far as absorption, but are not thick or lush or anything else you love about a bath towel.  I'm going to keep them out because they look nice, but use the big thick towels that may not look as good but feel great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2019
Author: Courtney
Title: SHEDS/LENT EVERYWHERE!!
Body: I took a chance on these towels despite the reviews saying that they shed, aren't absorbent, etc.  I searched Amazon for a good 30 minutes for a decent towel set and every set of towels from other brands I saw had these types of negative reviews so I thought I would just get these and see.  Well, those reviews are ACCURATE.  These towels feel very soft and are thick, but they shed SO MUCH.  I washed them as soon as I took them out of the box.  They left soo much lent in the lent filter and this does not get better with each wash.  They also leave small specs of lent all over my face, hair, and body when I'm drying off after a shower.  This is extremely annoying when I go to put lotion on and can't get the lent off of my body.  They also aren't absorbent at all.  I tried drying off a few times and my skin still felt damp.  I have had better luck with cheaper towels from Walmart.  I do not recommend these towels.  Waste of $30.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
Author: Shopper
Title: Not as soft as I was led to believe...
Body: Many of the reviewers of these towels commented on how soft and absorbent the towels are.  They are absorbent but far from soft.  The towel is thicker than some but no where near soft.  I've washed them twice and used fabric softener to try to soften them up but they're still pretty rough.  I would not buy these towels again nor would I recommend that anyone else buy them either.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
Author: Randolf
Title: Don‚Äôt you ever think to buy this [Updated]
Body: Even free is expensive. This towel set is trash. The first time you try to HAND WASH it became apart, also it doesn‚Äôt have the absorbency of real cotton.========================================================23 april 2020========================================================Although I was very sad and angry (the set I bought was not what I expected), I was very surprised that seller contacted me today (a few months after) and offer a replacement for free. That's very kind and I will buy again and try the products again, because that demonstrate respect with us, the customers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
Author: K. Carmouche
Title: Okay if you like having black fuzz all over you‚Ä¶
Body: These towels seemed like a great deal. I bought them for our cabin and prewashed them before taking them with us. First use: black fuzz everywhere. Okay, just needed to wash again, right? After second wash: black fuzz. After third wash: you guessed it, more (a lot) black fuzz. Now in my fourth wash and I am about to give up. Save yourself the headache and get different towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
Author: Amy Ruth
Title: Blue Fuzz EVERYWHERE
Body: I have washed these towels SEVERAL times and there is still blue fuzz all over my house. It's in the bathroom, bedroom, kitchen, my ass, EVERYWHERE! I've done everything I can think of to try to get the blue fuzz to stop. I'm disappointed because these look great, are soft and fluffy, and just what we were hoping for in every other way but I cannot stand the fuzz anymore.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
Author: Alf
Title: Great value for the cost
Body: Towels are soft and very absorbent.  I washed and dried them before use as instructed but I would have done this anyway.  Towels came out soft.  I used one right away and I loved the thickness of the towel.You get 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels, and 4 wash cloths for about $30.  That is a great value.  I would have no problem purchasing again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
Author: D. Adams
Title: Set of Towels
Body: My husband describes the towels as great.  They are very nice.  I didn't give them five stars because they ravel.  I understand that they were not clipped before selling.  However, they not only ravel around the edges but, in the middle of the towels also.  They have been washed twice.  I bought two sets of eight.  I do not regret my purchase at this point.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
Author: J Vu
Title: Not thin material, but quality could be better
Body: How many towels you get is cool, price is okay. The towels are not cheap, thin material, but the sewing is kinda weak and you see a few loose threads.From washing all the towels, I noticed two became significantly frayed or very noticeably... ripped? It extended all along the side of the towels. I cut the hanging part off, but obviously it would have been great if they were better quality to not do that.I don't regret the buy though, I just wonder if I could be gotten a better price from an actual store (probably yeah)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Disappointing color
Body: I have other brown towels purchased from Walmart.  Expected brown towels to be at least close in shade and they were not.  Can't even figure out a common item that is this shade of brown.  The Walmart towels are a shade similar to a dark chocolate candy bar...these are not even close to that.  From now on will get towels at Walmart.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
Author: Person
Title: Great stuff
Body: These definitely feel better after washing them. Don't put softener in with towels otherwise they will become less absorbant!The color was a bit darker than what I was expecting but you get a lot of good quality pieces in great sizes. I really enjoy this set and probably will order them again if I ever need more towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
Author: Vicki B.
Title: Not great.
Body: I first purchased these towels several months ago and was very happy with them so I decided to order more.This second order was very disappointing. The towels were not the same quality or color. Some were darker grey, some were lighter grey. Also after the first wash one of the large towels unraveled at the seam. I won‚Äôt be ordering them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
Author: john brightbill
Title: NOT COLORFAST
Body: I was excited to order these towels after reading the reviews.  After following the washing directions of warm water only and washing them separately about 6 times, there are spots of dis-colorization.  Let me be clear ... I DO NOT USE BLEACH!  I never wash anything with bleach, therefore there is no bleach residue in my machine.  I am so disappointed as these towels are good in every other area of wear and tear.  It's just my husband and myself using these towels.  I'd like my money back but not likely since they've been used for a couple months.  We also don't use harsh facial products that can sometimes lead to the same results.  SO DISAPPOINTED!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
Author: scrapperwannabe
Title: Practical & fluffy
Body: Bought some of the medium green color for our rustic Guesthouse.  These seem absorbent, wash up nice, and are fluffy.  I do add a touch of bleach to the washer for freshness and they haven't faded yet.  The seams are holding up well. However, when folding take off your rings as they snag very easily.  Don't hesitate to try these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020
Author: Na'kima
Title: Like when your mom holds you after getting hurt.
Body: These towels and washcloths are amazingly soft, and moisture absorbing, without retaining the water and smellinf afterwards. I tell you, the first time that I used them, I just held it on my face, and was transported back to when my mom would hug me after I hurt myself as a child. They are so soft, yet thick, and a very pretty color. I ordred the burgundy, but im getting thr light blue, and beige next. Great buy!!! üëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
Author: Anonymous7076
Title: Quality Issue
Body: I wish I could give these towels 5 stars. They are absorbent, soft and a good value. So, what's the problem?  I ordered 2 sets (2 towels, 2 hand towels, 4 washcloths each).  I washed them before first use as directed.  3 of the 4 towels had little pulls in the weave.  One had an ~ 6" string where the seam came undone. Not happy with that.  Will be contacting the company. REVISION 6/15/2021:  from 2* to 4*Customer service was AWESOME . They responded within an hour and immediately sent replacement.  Highly recommend!!
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
Author: James Gockel
Title: Average Bath Towels
Body: They are average bath towels. Nothing more. They are presentable and probably better quality than cheap towels, but I would not call them "luxury" nor "hotel quality"... maybe a travelodge? or motel quality.They aren't bad, but they aren't a $200 set of towels for $40... they are $40 towels for $40 at best.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
Author: Sheila
Title: Good value
Body: Purchased 2 sets for my guest bath.  Great price and color.  I did launder them before displaying.  There was no excess lint as other brands were indicating which was great.  I havent used them yet to judge absorbency.  I have had thicker towels but these are really my size and thickness preference.  I would purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great towels!
Body: I am very pleased with this purchase! I was hesitant in buying this towel set because I read some reviews about there being lint. Thankfully I did not experience any lint at all. I ordered the white towel set so I‚Äôm not sure if that‚Äôs why I am having a much better experience than others. I plan on buying more for my guest bathroom soon!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
Author: Albert M.
Title: SHODDY. HORRIBLE QUALITY. WASTE OF MONEY.
Body: After the first laundering, the edge seams start coming loose. After the second laundering, the edges themselves fray and unravel. After the third laudering, I exoect them only to be useable as cleaning rags at best. Plan to have to replace them after just a few washimgs. It"s better to give them a pass altogether.  I wouldn't buy them again. There's nothing "luxury" about them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
Author: Atlanta Lady
Title: Towels that fade
Body: These towels are nice and fairly soft, but when I washed them in warm water before using them, the dark red color bled all over lighter items in the wash.  Bath towels that aren't colorfast?  You must be kidding. Hope it won't happen again. Also, I have never seen towels produce so much lint in a single washing!  Hopefully we got most of the excess lint out, but I had to empty the drier lint filter twice.  Remains to be seen how they hold up over use and time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
Author: Jamie M
Title: Buy these!!
Body: These are the best ‚Äúnew‚Äù towels I have ever had. They actually dry you off and don‚Äôt leave fuzzies all over you! They are soft like a nice new luxurious towel yet feel broken in like a favorite towel already. They are not super thick but I don‚Äôt mind that, they do not feel cheap at all despite that. The green is very pretty in my opinion, maybe a little lighter than screen appearance online. I followed recommended wash directions on tag and did not use fabric softener but so far have not missed it! As new towels they did leave a lot of lint in dryer lint trap as expected, but dried easily.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
Author: jaq
Title: Do not recommend
Body: Not what I expected. When I opened them one towel had a pull but I figured that was fine for what I paid for them. After washing they all have pulls and strings hanging off. They are also really thin. I bought these for the guest bathroom but I am a embarrassed to have guests see these. The only good thing is the color. They are dark gray as stated. I will definitely not buy these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2020
Author: Sean J
Title: Truly disappointed.
Body: Truly disappointed with these towels. Literally unpackaged and washed them alone on normal warm setting and dried on tumble. When we took them out of the drier to fold we found multiple frays and hems coming undone.They are called the hotel collection, so these must be for an hourly rate hotel.We really like the color gray but are not satisfied with quality of the sewing. They are coming apart at the seams...Literally.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
Author: Marla L. Borman
Title: Absorbency
Body: Loved the color, I checked the reviews for absorbency before purchasing but I did not find them to be absorbent at all.  I have washed them ten times and still getting tons of lint in the dryer and they still just smear the water around on my skin.  I'm so disappointed but I will continue to wash and dry and hope for them to become absorbent at some point.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
Author: Joanne
Title: ***Seller stands by their product!
Body: For the price they are ok. The binding on the edge of one of the bath towels and one of the hand towels frayed when I washed them out of the package. They are still usable but I expecting something more when they are advertised as hotel quality.***Seller rectified and sent another set. Would recommend this seller as they obviously stand by what they sell.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: retired
Title: Almost perfect
Body: They looked nice right out of the package. I got the blue and it‚Äôs exactly the color shown. I washed them before the first use using listed washing instructions. Almost all of them cane out looking great. BUT, one of the hand towels started unraveling on one edge. I was able to cut threads and will continue to use it.Hope the second washing doesn‚Äôt show similar results.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
Author: Melissa Verch
Title: Disappointed.
Body: ***update*** the seller reached out and sent a replacement set for which I‚Äôm truly thankful for***I am disappointed in theses towels. Washed them as soon as I got them and they frayed. One of the hand towels and one of the bath towels. Definitely overpriced for the low quality of the towels. I will say they are nice and thick and absorbent. Just poorly sewn.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2019
Author: Wayne H
Title: Not luxurious.
Body: Received these yesterday  and washed them as directed. They were not soft or thick when they arrived. So I decided to was and fluff them up in the dryer as directed. Well not impressed. They did soften up some and seem a bit thicker but they are nowhere near "luxury hotel spa style". Feel not much different  then my ordinary 6 year old towels I was replacing. I mean they are not bad towels but they are NOT super soft and luxurious.Update: was contacted by the seller and offered a replacement set. Second set came and was much better. More absorbent and softer. Great customer service! Thank you.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
Author: mntman
Title: they shed fibers like crazy
Body: please dont buy these towels. recieved them and they looked very nice. 1st wash, on delicate cycle, they shed like a dog in the summer heat. my washer was litered with small fabric from these towels. when using them for the 1st time after a bath, same small fibers on my body. they are thick and they are soft, but cant figure out why they shed like they do. never had a towel set do this. afraid to wash them again.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
Author: Jan
Title: Not soft
Body: Followed all the directions included for washing and drying these towels.  It took about 3 washes to get them to absorb moisture rather than just smear it around.  It has been 3 weeks, about 9 washes and they are even rougher with no sign of softening up.  Directions say not to use fabric softener but we are now going to try adding some.  Hotel towels are a lot softer than these.  Update:  Fabric softener is helping.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
Author: Anne Snyder
Title: Disappointed
Body: The towels are the same quality as low end ones purchased at Walmart.  Their size is adequate.  Advertised as fluffy, they are not.  They are tightly woven and coarse.  They are also fairly thin.  Their absorbency is OK but nothing to brag about.  Overall, they are cheap, so much more probably should not be expected.  I had hoped for better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Amazing quality towels and fantastic customer service!
Body: These towels are AMAZING! Plush and absorbent. The color I got (blue) is such a beautiful color, it sparks joy every time I look at the set. I have also ordered multiple sets of towels from the same manufacturer, including floor mats, and they all match perfectly.Customer service was fantastic also. I had a small stitching issue with one hand towel among the many many towels received and reached out to the company. They were immediately responsive and more than generous in making it right.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
Author: Romeo
Title: Average purchase
Body: I ordered two sets of these towels to match a bathroom renovation. So, after a $70 purchase, I was disappointed to learn that after the first wash, the towels were already showing signs of loose strings appearing at various areas, not just the hemmed edgings. Absorbency and softness are average at best.  I am not confident that these towels will hold up from daily use and will have to look for additional options.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
Author: Lori
Title: These towels feel great!
Body: After a new bathroom remodel, I wanted all new towels. The spa shower we installed called for nice big fluffy towels. We love how luxurious these feel and have only washed them twice. I‚Äôm sure they will get even better with a few more washes. The dark grey color feels more expensive than these towels are. Great value for 8 pieces. We loved them so much we ordered a second set!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2021
Author: Marsha
Title: You have to try these towels!
Body: These towel sets (I purchased 2 sets,) are really soft, absorbant, just the right thickness. The color (I purchased gray) is really pretty and rich looking.  I liked the first set and went back for a second! And the cost is very reasonable. Give these towels a try! :-)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Reasonably Priced Towel Set
Body: This towel set features two bath towels, two hand towels and four face cloths, just what I was looking for.  After several washings, they are holding up well, and I love the sage green color.  The quality is better than average, and well worth this price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
Author: Joseph T. Lopiccolo
Title: Don‚Äôt seem soft at all
Body: I‚Äôm not sure if I was supposed to wash this first before feeling how soft they are but just through sticking my finger in and feeling them through the package these are very coarse and comparable to my current house I don‚Äôt understand all the high ratings claiming how soft and luxurious they are. I am returning them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2019
Author: Gingi
Title: Nice Towels
Body: These towels are are a great deal. I usually like to mix and match items, having said that they match everything in the room. Remember, when washing do not use fabric softener they will not be fluffy. I was told years ago to use a golf ball in the dryer to make them fluffy and dry faster. It's funny now they actually sell little balls pretty cheap, you can get them at the dollar Tree. I would buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
Author: CBI
Title: Not as described
Body: The set is thin and scratchy; much like an inexpensive bar towel.  Best used as cleaning or shop towels.  This is not a luxury item.  Customer service would not confirm if it was a mistake or acknowledge the inferiority of the product but did offer a return for refund under Amazon guarantee.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
Author: Jake
Title: Towels are very soft and customer service is great
Body: Got the white towels and they are better than most hotel towels I have used before. Some of my towels had a QA issue so I was able to work with customer service on getting a replacement. Really swift and proactive communication, much appreciated!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
Author: Don L. Binder
Title: Only used a few days, but much softer than our other towels. And the sizes are all fine for us.
Body: They were not as thick or plush as we expected, but dry very well. We have a water softener, so don't use fabric softener, and my wife uses vinegar and the right temp in the washer and dryer, so hope these towels keep their softness and absorbency forever! So far, so good

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
Author: Dennis
Title: Towels arrived promptly and in good condition
Body: I might take a point off for some threads that came out with the first wash but these towels are very soft and absorbent and I am pleased. I cut the string on one of the towels and so far no sign of fraying but they are getting their second wash right now...we will see. The product hough is very good based on initial experience.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
Author: Donna
Title: Lint and Customer Service experience
Body: The towels I purchased were releasing way too much lint and clogging my dryer's lint tray.  I was nervous about that much lint causing a fire in my dryer. When I contacted customer service they were very apologetic and were very quick to send me replacement towels. They couldn't guarantee that there would be any less lint in the new towels sent but hopefully there won't be an issue since I like the towels.  I have purchased a different color of the same towels previously and have had no issues. The photo of the lint is from only two towels after 3rd wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020
Author: Steve M.
Title: New review after 5 month usage.
Body: I bought 2 towel, four washcloth, two hand towels combo. It has been five months since my receipt in July of this towel set. My previous review said they appeared to be very good quality thick towels. However just recently one has started to unravel on the side seam. This disappoints as I like them. I rotate the two towels with my two originals.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Gives bathrooms that spa feeling.
Body: I was looking for some white towels to go with our remodeled bathroom and liked that this set gave you 2 extra wash clothes compared to other sets I looked at.  They are just like the towels in hotels we have stayed at. I have just received them so have only washed them once but they held up well and look great in my bathroom. The face towels are a good size 12x12 which are bigger than other sets I have purchased in the past. If they continue to hold up well I will be looking into other colors as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
Author: Vaishnavh
Title: Thick and absorbent.
Body: The towel is thick and feels like high quality (I've only used it for a couple of days, so I can't say for sure). Didn't bleed any colors during the first wash.I'll come back to increase my rating after a few months if it lasts well!
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2020
Author: Matt R.
Title: These towels are shredding and making a huge mess
Body: I normally wouldn't bother writing a review on towels but I had to share my experience with these towels. Most will give off lint for the first few washings but these literally fell apart. I wish that I was in the warranty period so I can return them. I'll have to turn these into shop towels. Very poor quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Quality
Body: These 100% cotton towels are just what I've been looking for !  They are soft and fluffy and very absorbent. I ordered the Sage color and they were a good match with the advertisement. Not too thin or too heavy ...just right .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2020
Author: Tyeüíï
