Title: Not genuine
Body: I received these & washed them as soon as I got them because you know it‚Äôs still a pandemic going on. after the wash there were pink stains as if it was bleached or something. I only washed the towels by themselves I don‚Äôt know what happen. I was very disappointed. But I received a refund.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020
Author: Very surprised customer
Title: What luxury??
Body: These items have some thickness but produce a lot of lint so that will not last long.  Also the wash clothes are torn around the stitching out of the box!  This not hotel quality as in the description.  These are cheaply made towels that will not last very long with regular use.  I think these will be going back.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
Author: R.P.M.
Title: Great towel set !
Body: These towels are soft and absorbent. The bath towels and hand towels are great and I like that there are four wash cloths instead of two. I appreciate that I can switch them out frequently. The set looks great on the towel racks in the bath while in use, and luxurious rolled and stacked in the linen  shelf. The delivery was as promised and the product is great. I have no hesitation in recommending this product and this seller.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020
Author: Jeb
Title: Good Quality
Body: These towels are larger than our previous towels and are working well.  They still are producing a lot of lint in the dryer even after a half dozen washings.  Because of the lint generation they take longer to dry.  They are not as soft as the old towels but are very good at absorbing the water.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
Author: pamela5657
Title: Shoddy quality! Walk away.
Body: Such poor quality.  Bought these for guests who were coming in from out of town ...they even aren't accepable for my family to use!  In the picture you can see that they must have run out of yarn/string/thread (?) and so they just figured they'd finish the border, even if it's uneven and looks awful. Sending them back and will find a higher quality set of towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
Author: CV
Title: Worst towels ever
Body: I really had high hopes for these towels.  After I washed them, they felt very soft and thick.  Unfortunately, they don't dry very well.  It was like trying to dry myself with a wet beach towel.  I washed them a second time, thinking that might solve the problem, but unfortunately, it did not.  The same experience again; it felt like I was drying my body with a very wet towel.I am 68 yrs old and have purchased many towels over the years.  These are by far the worst that I have ever purchased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
Author: Emma
Title: I'd keep looking
Body: These towels are okay. I just moved and didn't want to be going store to store during COVID to find towels. I was strict that they had to be 100% cotton but I didn't want to spend a ton. These towels do the trick but they do shed quite a bit leaving lint on my face and body after showering. The threading also pulls easily and I already have some loose threads after one wash. They are soft and they do dry you off but I wouldn't say they are amazing towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
Author: Irvin L Powell
Title: Surprisingly soft and fluffy
Body: The White Classic package I purchased was at such a great price that I was a little apprehensive about making the purchase. However, when I received the package I was pleasantly surprised with the feel and quality of the towels. I washed and dried the towels as directed and that gave me an even bigger surprise. The towels and wash cloths just seem to come alive with the wash. They were actually softer and fluffier after the wash. It is so comforting to know there are true purchases of value to be had in a marketplace fraught with an overabundance of sophistry. Thank you White Classic!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
Author: LH
Title: Awesome towels! Love them!
Body: These towels are awesome! They are the perfect thickness and size. I bought them in the pink. The pink is a dusty pink, not too bright, just perfect. I bought extra hand towels. The hand towels are a bit longer than some which is awesome. They are well made, and absorbent. I've only washed them once but they look like they are well made and will hold up. I will edit my review if they do not. I absolutely love these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
Author: Leah
Title: Good quality for price
Body: I really liked the gray/white towel set combo but learned on first wash not to wash together cause my new white towels now have some gray throughout. ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è My mistake. Overall happy with quality of these towels though. Good value and good size.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
Author: Amy Rainbow
Title: Threadbare and thin
Body: Whoever thinks these towels are luxury must have been drying themselves with tissues all this time. The plastic package they came in was open, not torn or ripped in transit, clearly opened. They looked like they had been stuffed back in the bag and returned and I got sent them without anyone even checking them. All items were present and when I saw the package open I thought, no biggie I need to wash them first anyway but looking at the quality, I doubt they'd even last a wash. Light was literally shining through the weave of these thin threadbare "towels"... idk if I just got someone's used castoff or what but they are being returned!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
Author: J. Pratt
Title: Bleach-safe White Towels
Body: Ordered a 2nd set of these since I liked them so much. Wanted white towels I could use chlorine bleach on and these are great. Colored towels fade in just a few washings but white cotton towels like these can be bleached back to whiteness easily. Very soft, very fluffy - great quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
Author: evierose
Title: Poorly sewn hand towels
Body: The hand towels in this set were very poorly sewn.  The bath towels and wash cloths were fine and were exactly the weight/fabric I was looking for so I am keeping the set with the hope that I can figure out how to repair the hand towels.  I would still recommend them with the hope that my problem was an isolated one.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2019
Author: Florida Jo
Title: Beautiful towels
Body: I was pleasantly surprised when this set arrived and happy every time I wash them. They're just the thickness and softness I want, luxurious for the price. I've washed them several times. The bath-size towels and washcloths still look great; the hem at the corner of one of the hand towels has come apart and there is a snag near it. Overall, I'm very pleased with the set and will probably buy more in the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
Author: Anonymous Salve
Title: Disappointed
Body: These towels went from super soft before washing to just eh after washing in warm water and medium heat, as instructed.  There was literally 2 cups of lint!!!!!  Other towels would have been better to purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
Author: Heather L. Goble
Title: Not ‚ÄúLuxury‚Äù
Body: Color is true to imageAbsorbency is alright, gets job done with frictionNot softNot fluffyJust like Walmart brand or a good dollar tree findSave your money
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
Author: Dora B.
Title: Towels
Body: I washed them after I received them and they had lint balls, so I dryed them thoroughly. They are very thick and after drying I notices that one wash cloth and towels had some ravel thread but no lint balls. I cut off the threads and the towels are fine. I would recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020
Author: Frequent flyer miles
Title: Very disappointed- I want my money back! And will throw them out!
Body: I‚Äôve washed them 8+ times and they still shed everywhere! :-( all over bathtub and all over me! I have to shower again after using it! I‚Äôm tired of washing/drying  them over and over since the material keeps coming out - I‚Äôm thinking of throwing them away !!!! :-(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020
Author: Shopper
Title: White Classic towel sets are very soft, luxurious, absorbent and perfect size.
Body: Love these White Classic towels.  They surpassed all the other towels I have ever bought.  These towels really absorb moisture off the skin and towels don't feel wet.  They wash and dry really fluffy and soft.  Would be great gifts to anybody and am positive they would love them also.  Am going to buy another set of eight but in a different color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
Author: Rick and Ashly
Title: These are durable and good towels
Body: These towels are durable and good, I would not consider them luxury.Pros: Wash and dry wellColor is true to pictureThicker than some hand towels from off-brand retailersSoft after washingCons:These aren't as thick as I had hoped/expected

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2020
Author: Mark E. Gorman
Title: Very disappointed
Body: The only thing I like about these towels is the color (blue).  I needed to wash them three times before they stopped leaving blue fuzz all over our bodies and the bathroom.  They are not absorbent, and they're unravelling.  I'm so unhappy with these towels, I'm buying another set from another company.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
Author: SrevirAlemap
Title: Very Soft - Will be purchasing more!
Body: These towels are very soft. I haven't used them yet, but I washed the white and grey set together and there was no fading. But if you're looking for a lightweight towel, keep looking because these towels are heavyweight.I think they're great - will be purchasing more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
Author: Terry Wolford
Title: Washed once and falling apart
Body: Purchased them for "decorative use" due to selling my home. They arrived with multiple creases in the box as expected of most towels. Washed the set to make them look normal. While drying them they filled the lint trap twice. When I pulled them out sadly the bath towels had started to unravel. Had previously purchased Pinzon before but didn't have white available. Pinzon is far superior to this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020
Author: PharmDMommy
Title: Finally - an adult-sized bath towel that is affordable!
Body: Our family has been home much more than usual and our bath towels and hand towels have been abused. I ordered a set of these and also bought the Kohl‚Äôs brand Big Bath towels that were on sale. These are SO much nicer and worth the few extra dollars. Great absorbency and softness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2020
Author: L.E.
Title: Good, utility towels
Body: Bought these for my son who doesn‚Äôt like thick towels. They are of average weight, not too think and washed well. I bought the grey and white and the grey retained its color after washing. Not luxury spa towels, but for the price and the way my son does laundry, they‚Äôre great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
Author: Amy Hudson
Title: Functional but flawed.
Body: Functional but flawed. They absorb fine and feel soft, yet the color is already fading in spots. The grey is turning a light purple. The towels have been used maybe 4 times and all of them have threads pulling out. I bought a different brand for my son and they are doing much better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
Author: Keliza
Title: OK everyday lightweight towels
Body: These are OK everyday lightweight towels and a good set for the price. But they are very thin towels, not close to the thick towels that you find at a hotel or spa. So if you're looking for plush thick luxurious towels, these are not it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
Author: Linda from Omaha
Title: New towels the same! Pictures. Need refund
Body: I thought these towels would be great.  However, I washed them twice before using them and they almost fell apart.....lots and lots of pilling and brown string, etc. all over the inside of my washer and also the dryer.  The washclothes seem ok so far.  I would never buy these.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
Author: chimi
Title: Great towels, better cx
Body: I've been buying these towels for a short term rental. They normally last and haven't had an issue except for the last batch that came out of its first wash with the sewing coming apart. Only two large towels came out as such, the rest were fine. I sent an message to their Customer support with pictures of the towels. They sent me a replacement quickly. Very glad I buy these towels from them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
Author: Jessica Mastrobuono
Title: Not the best but not terrible
Body: These are alright towels. They‚Äôre not too thin but not thick and luxurious. For the price, you get a good amount of them but the quality just isn‚Äôt there. One wash and there are frays on the seams. Kind of disappointing but they will hold us over until tj maxx opens back up from COVID19.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
Author: RoseAmelie
Title: Great value for money
Body: Love the color. Is oatmeal. Size is perfect and absorbency. I have washed them just once but I was expecting them to be a bit thicker. They are a bit thin and soft but not as soft as expected either. I might buy them in another color still since they are a great value for money and they do absorb super.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
Author: Sherilyn
Title: Very absorbent
Body: These were quite thick and absorbent, however they were a brownish peach that didn't match and hadn't been even close to what the display showed. I used them anyway, but the color bothered me more and more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2021
Author: Dennis
Title: Hotel quality for home.
Body: I‚Äôve checked the hotels we stay at towels. The mostly seem to be really good. I was looking for a quality towel like that for home, when you dry off, the towel isn‚Äôt soaked and your still wet. These towels are definitely them. Well satisfied, and considering buying another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
Author: Ed
Title: My body was covered in lint.
Body: I just purchased two sets of towels. My first new set in ten years. They are very soft. They are not in anyway absorbent!!! They leave navy blue lint all over my body and in the lint filter. They have been washed and dried 20 times just to try and get the lint out. Disappointed and angry. I had to throw them out.I just purchased new towels from JC Penney and they are amazing.Do not buy these!!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great!
Body: These look flimsy straight out of the package but after a wash they fluffed up very nicely.  I'm in the process of moving and have been using the hand towels to dry my dishes... they work wonderfully.  I will be purchasing more.I got the white and grey, the white towels are true white and fluffy.  The grey is a regular boring grey, perfect for hiding makeup stains.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
Author: LT3
Title: Do NOT buy navy!
Body: I purchased these and the light green towels at the same time. Washed both sets as soon as they arrived. The green towels were fine, but the navy left blue "scum" all over the body after showering. I washed and dried the navy set twice after the first washing. I could not believe the amount of lint in my washing machine and in the dryer vent! If they still leave a film on the body after 3 washes, I'm using them for rags!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
Author: Cynthia
Title: They aren't the worst but not the best
Body: I wouldn't bother reviewing these if it hadn't been for the loose bundles of threads that keep coming loose from the stitching. It doesn't really affect the utility of the towels, but I expected a little better for $35. Not luxury, just reminds me of my dog's towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020
Author: Thomas Johnston
Title: Color bleeds, lots of lint, random threads poor stitching
Body: While soft and absorbent, even after several washing the color still bleeds. Turns water in sink pink just while washing the face and hands. Tried using vinegar to set the color, did not help much.  LOTS of lint, have had to empty lint screen twice during drying cycle. Have had to trim threads from stitching, some missed stitching.  The random long threads in the middle of the towels that had to be trimmed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
Author: J Harbin
Title: Not quite the "luxury" I expected, but you get what you pay for.
Body: First, these towels get the job done. They are absorbent enough. However, very disappointed in the quality. While the price  should have been the indicator, I trusted the raving reviews that the quality of these towels were greater than the price paid. Not the case. They are not very soft. They also shed a lot which I am most disappointed with. No one wants to dry off and be left with a lot of fibers. I have to rinse off again after using these towels.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
Author: J Elle
Title: Hotel quality budget friendly
Body: Feels and looks very luxurious.like hotel towels and not motel 6 I'm talking Hilton/Marriot/Ritz Carlton. Not like regular towels, the absorbency is A1. I'd like to purchase more but the color I want is not in stock. Overall these towels are a great buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2019
Author: David Brennan
Title: Did not meet expectations
Body: These towels become less luxurious after each wash.  After 5 washes, they still overwhelm the lint filter on my dryer.  They look okay hanging, but just are not all that thick and soft.  I'd say they are worth about half the price they charge.  Plus I only received two wash cloths, not the four they advertise.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
Author: DonaP
Title: Wonderfully Absorbent Towels!
Body: I really needed new towels and these do not disappoint! They are absorbent, soft, and a great value.  I was so pleased with them that I ordered several sets for a family member. I highly recommend these towels -- give yourself a wonderful gift of fluffy, absorbent, soft towels. You will love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
Author: Hannah Schurr
Title: Great value
Body: I ordered these towels for my newly renovated bathroom based on their great reviews, the color, and the AWESOME price. They are true to color and look exactly the same as their photos - grays can be hard to match, so I was really pleased about this. And you can't beat this price for a set of towels. However, some of the reviews described them as 'luxurious', which I found to be untrue. They're quality towels and I hope to get a lot of years out of them, but they're  not fluffy, spa quality. For bathroom towels that I'll use every day, they look great and get the job done for an unbeatable price. I'd recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2020
Author: Ariel Deg
Title: Do not waste your money
Body: Honestly worst towels I have ever purchased. When I first used them they weren't absorbent at all and they were shedding so bad. I tried everything to fix them and nothing helped. They are still not absorbent and shed badly. I've gotten better towels from Walmart.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
Author: CDP Martin
Title: Our Favorite Towels
Body: Amazing. This is one of a few sets I purchased for our new home. This is our favorite set hands down. They became softer and fluffed up after washing and are super absorbent. I will be purchasing another 2 sets ASAP

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
Author: Rich Madsen
Title: Lasted six months !
Body: Nice and soft, made of a good weight fabric.Unfortunately the seams all started to come apart.If they were better stitched together they would be great towels.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
Author: Jared_122
Title: Great towels
Body: Just the right amount of softness and thickness, look really nice and I have bought more. When you wash and dry these for the first six or so times. Do them with other towels only, because they do fill up the lint trap fast at first.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
Author: Ozan Kalpak
Title: They are nice but....
Body: I bought the "Burgandy" and it is without a doubt definitely a true RED color.I ended up keeping it because I just needed towels and didn't want to got through the hassle but if you're buying the burgandy don't expect it to be the color you hope.After two washes the lint decreased greatly and they are absorbent and nice. I am kicking myself for buying red though because you have to be careful with what you wash it with, I'll never fully trust it to not stain light clothing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
Author: pnw snowbird
Title: Luxury at a small price
Body: You could pay more and still not get towels as thick as these. They add a nice touch to our newly-remodeled master bath. No loose threads or hems that you often see: these are well made. Add a little touch of luxury to your bathroom with these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2021
Author: Noreen S
Title: Terrible Towels
Body: Continue to freely lint, after 4 wash/dry cycles and don't absorb. Might have continued to wash and dry but absorbency is the purpose of a towel so will use as expensive covers for garage items.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
Author: Mary Ann Whipple
Title: Great towels for the price!
Body: The only fault I have is that after 6 washings, the colors don‚Äôt seem to exactly match, they are grey and some look lighter that others, but overall I love the towels
Style: Color: Silver Grey | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
Author: Kiley
Title: Color ones fade after first wash!
Body: I literally just took these out of the package and washed them like the directions say. They have random faded spots on them. I washed them by themselves and use a free and clear detergent. I never got to use them. This is just awful on a first wash. If you decide to get these DON‚ÄôT get color. They are thin and not very fluffy. Guess it does come down to ‚Äúyou get what you pay for.‚Äù

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
Author: Daylene Wolf
Title: Thinner than usual, but absorbent and soft
Body: The towels thickness is a little thinner than I would like, but have great absorbency and the are soft. I‚Äôm curious to see how well they really hold up. So far so good, but I have only had them for a few weeks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
Author: Paul J. Archibald
Title: Simply Wonderful
Body: I ordered these towels based on the descriptions and hoped for the best.  And the best was exactly what I received.  These towels are thick, heavy terry cloth and soak up the water like nobody's business.  They seem to be completely color-fast and wash well.  Excellent quality at a very good price, and the service is prompt and courteous. Recommended without reservation.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
Author: Hopper
Title: LOVELY, SOFT TOWELS!
Body: These are wonderful towels! They come out of the dryer soft and fluffy. What I especially like is that they're absorbent without being too heavy. They're well worth the price and I'm about to order another set in a different color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2020
Author: Darlene A. Stockel
Title: At this time, it was essential to obtain quality toweling.
Body: I immediately appreciated the general overall size of the toweling, the good luxury feeling and upon actual use, was quite impressed with the overall effectiveness of my choice.  I would purchase this item again should the need arise.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
Author: barb
Title: Nice without too much weight.
Body: These towels are just what I was looking for, absorbent, soft, but not too thick or heavy. The package did say that they would fluff up more after an initial wash/dry cycle which was true, so don‚Äôt judge softness tight out of the package.  And the price was great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2021
Author: Evolve0808
Title: Great Price Quality Product
Body: I was looking to add towels to my newly renovated master bathroom. I needed a fair amount of towels and these were the right price point and exactly what I was looking for. I will purchase more of these in the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
Author: Patricia S. Moran
Title: Frayed
Body: They looked great but after putting them through a delicate cycle in the wash before using them,  they came out of the dryer frayed down the side.  They will not last long

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
Author: Duff the Coach
Title: Great value!
Body: The insert with these towels explains that they will "fluff up" after washing and they definitely do. Nice quality and excellent value. Washed very well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2020
Author: Kate Warren
Title: Not the best towels, disappointed.
Body: I washed them before using them.  They practically clogged the dryer filter, so much lint!  One of the hand towels side seam can apart!!  When I used them I had lint all over the shower.  They are soft and absorb pretty well.  But disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
Author: B. Randall
Title: Inaccurate Color
Body: Dont get your hopes up if youre picky about color, orders the dark grey and got something more akin to mint light green. Pretty disappointed. Otherwise they seem fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
Author: Todd
Title: Worth every cent
Body: Awesome towels, they fluff up great after first wash and are really absorbent.  Also they are very low lint, it‚Äôs great to towel off after a shower with a new towel and not have the usual new towel lint stuck in your stubble.  Will definitely by more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
Author: John
Title: Disappointment.
Body: I was disappointed when I received these towels. I expected them to be thick and fluffy like the towels that I had gotten before, but they were not. They are thin and not fluffy at all. Do not waste your money don‚Äôt buy them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2020
Author: CE
Title: Not quality I expected.
Body: These towels are rough to the skin, especially the wash clothes. They are pretty thin and not very absorbent. I have already washed them and taken the tabs off or I would return them.Update:I washed these towels a few times to try and soften them up and the seam started coming apart on bath towel and I had to empty lint screen three times to get the towels dried! Tons of lint! Merchant offered me .01 cent for a refund. Big of them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2020
Author: SilentK
Title: Unraveling after first wash
Body: I really want to like these towels, but after the first wash I had to throw out three of the towels because they unraveled so much. I do not have high hopes for the longevity of the remaining towels. I do like the softness and the absorbency is adequate. I was not expecting these towels to last years, but unraveling after the first wash is not acceptable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
Author: Mary Ellerbrake
Title: Terrible.
Body: Bought 2 sets for kid heading to college. Washed on cold, low heat dry before packing - glad I did. These are falling apart after 1 wash. They shed like crazy in the washer & dryer. Seams & edging falling off. Returning tomorrow.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
Author: jane eves
Title: Color?
Body: Quality is great, size as advertised but the color? Nothing even similar to the photo. Instead of a nice bright pink, these looked as though they had been washed with blue clothing that was not colorfast! I wouldn't even call them pink. What a disappointment.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
Author: Shnoodlemoo
Title: Soft, absorbent, quality
Body: Pleasantly surprised. Soft. Absorbent. Nice color. Holds up well - been washed multiple times. Would definitely recommend and will buy more in the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
Author: Sunshine
Title: Eh.. decent but not great
Body: They're okay, but I bought some others from a brand called Mauro and they were much higher and squishier. I'll buy the other brand next time. These ones also shed like crazy the first time washed (have only washed once so don't know beyond that).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
Author: LLC
Title: Horrible quality/completely shredded in dryer
Body: I am so sick and tired of poor quality towels. I gave Amazon one more chance and they really blew it with these towels. We had to vacuum out the compartment where the dryer filter sits because of all the shredded material from the towels! And they were put in the dryer on low heat! Very disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
Author: Erin
Title: Eh.
Body: I thought that these were supposed to be nice luxury bath towels but instead they are lacking in thickness unfortunately.  Not worth the price in my opinion ... I‚Äôd rather spend a little more to get nice soft, hotel quality towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
Author: minac
Title: Cheap and already coming apart before being used
Body: These towels feel only slightly softer and slightky thicker than my Ikea towels but at least my Ikea towels don't fall apart after washing them once.  I'll be donating these to my local animal shelter while I keep shopping around :/

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
Author: Ruth Hutt
Title: Worth the money
Body: Product was good only issue I had is you need to wash this set a few times due to the amount of lint that comes off. In spite of that it‚Äôs a very good set for the money and I will reorder.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
Author: Shopper Sue
Title: Not that great.
Body: I read the reviews that said they would fluff up after washing and drying. They're not as fluffy and soft as my very very old Ralph Lauren towels are now. There are bright white which is what I wanted. But they're not luxury towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2020
Author: NaeNae
Title: Not worth buying.
Body: Followed the initial directions prior to use. Used them ONE time and when taken out of the dryer many threads were hanging throughout the towels. They looked like worms crawling down the towels. BOTH sides. I am past disappointed and will NEVER buy these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Fluffy
Body: I wash them with a very minimal amt of liquid softener, like just enough to avoid static and they are plenty fluffy while being quite absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
Author: Tiffany
Title: Frayed seam immediately
Body: I had read so many great reviews of these towels, I was excited for no hassle towels for the guest bathroom. I prewashed them on a gentle cycle and one of the towels came out of the dryer frayed all the way down the long side.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
Author: Amanda Keith
Title: Great deal!
Body: I am very impressed with the quality and price in this towel set! Great deal for bath towels, hand towels and wash cloths. I would certainly buy again for our other bathrooms!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020
Author: NC East
Title: Luxury with an issue
Body: Towels shed like crazy but, so far, have retained luxury texture. Be sure to not mix with other items for first few wash/dry cycles. Clean drier filter several times while drying. Unbelievable amount of lint.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2021
Author: Sherrie D.
Title: Soooooo soft!
Body: Love this color blue...goes with so many other colors and fits my beach themed bathroom.  Very soft and wash and dry very well.  Totally recommend!
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
Author: Happy Customer
Title: Great towels!
Body: These towels are great, the absorbency and thickness are better than the name brand towels that I‚Äôve bought in the past. I bought only one set to see if I liked them. I‚Äôll be buying more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
Author: Skitz
Title: The Softest Towels!
Body: Beautiful towels- the color matched the picture very well. All of the towels are thick, absorbent and incredibly soft- I'm keeping them as decor towels, though, because I'm afraid if I wash them they'll lose all their luxe. The picture shows a towel my daughter used after a shower and if it dries well enough that it doesn't smell used, I'm going to put it back with me decor towels. :-) I will be buying more for my bathroom!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
Author: Karen R. Frantz
Title: Lots of lint in dryer
Body: I have not personally used these. I bought them as guest towels. They are very soft. I do know they out off a LOT of lint. I have washed them twice and they filled the lint trap in my dryer both times. Will have to see how they hold up. So far, they seem like good towels at a reasonable price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
Author: SusiH
Title: Beautiful, but marred.
Body: I loved this product and washed to put in my new bathroom.  When I was folding it, I noticed a rather large flaw on one of the big towels.  Tried to get a new one, but no help, no response.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
Author: Kitty
Title: Great towels
Body: I actually purchased this towel set after having the washcloth set for almost a year. I decided to try out the larger towels and I wasn‚Äôt disappointed. Hoping they will be as long lasting as the washcloths that are still in great shape after a year.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
Author: tadpole
Title: soft and fluffy
Body: First set of brand new towels I've had in quite some time, and these are luxuriously soft and still good at whicking away moisture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
Author: MamaKay
Title: Great Set of Towels
Body: I waited to write a review until I had used them and laundered them several times.  These towels and washcloths are thick and soft, and a nice large size.  They are sturdy and go in and out of the washer and dryer nicely.  The color was a perfect match for my bathroom.  All in all, a great buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
Author: EmilyD
Title: Not super durable but fine!
Body: These are pretty good! Needed them for guest towels and they work just fine. Most held up in the wash but one immediately had a bunch of loose threads which is a little annoying, but not bad for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
Author: ronda hays
Title: Good seller and nice product
Body: Very smooth transaction and quick delivery. Beautiful towels, but there we're a few manufacturer's defects. The problem was taken care of by replacing the defective pieces and I am well satisfied.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
Author: Teyon Alexander
Title: Started coming apart
Body: I bought this for my friend after I had bought the grey ones for myself. My experience and hers were complete opposites. The beige ones I bought her started falling apart after the first wash before use. I felt bad because I suggested and bought these for her since she just moved into a new place and now she has to buy a replacement set. I can't recommend the brand if the quality is so hit or miss.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
Author: Joanna Andino
Title: The best towels!
Body: I love these towels. I have them in black, beige and green. They are big and fluffy. They dry so well and look great! I am slowly buying different colors to replace my old towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
Author: tn
Title: Where are the washcloths?
Body: Arrived with two towels and four hand towels  instead of two towels, two hand towels and four wash cloths so not as described.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
Author: GrammieFaith
Title: Soft, fluffy and absorbentt
Body: Redoing decor in my masterbath and using indigo and white for an Asian theme. These towels and the white ones are fantastic. Soft, fluffy and absorbent.  Just like the Spa

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
Author: Anna Wong
Title: Great towels
Body: I needed to replace our towels. These came quickly and are very nice. I did wash them before use and they came through the wash and dry well. They seem like good quality, not thin. I'm thinking of buying another set

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
Author: Roz L
Title: SOFT AND STURDY
Body: I was looking for brown towels that were plush, sturdy and value for the money. I found them in White Classic Luxury Towels!
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
Author: Kathy
Title: Soft and fluffy ( wash before using)
Body: Wash these towels and they are fluffy and soft! Such a great purchase for the price.  Full sized hotel style towels . I bought them for a guest bathroom and am glad I did. Quality towels , hand towels and was cloths.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
Author: Ardell
Title: Soft
Body: These towels are like an old favorite towel that is no longer made.  Thick and soft.  I have already ordered a second set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
Author: Esther
Title: Very soft
Body: Very soft and comfy as described.  Washes well with eco-friendly detergent.  I also really like the gray color.Highly recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
Author: kim
Title: Love the color choice
Body: These towels hit all the criteria of soft, absorbent and good size.  But I was so happy to have the option of white and grey towels without having to buy a set of each!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
Author: E. W.
Title: White Classic Towels- Grey 8 piece set
Body: These are nice towels. I've washed them a few times and they hold their loft and color. They're thick absorbent and soft.  So far they are color fast... I haven't used bleach on them.  I don't use fabric softener on towels either. It makes the fabric repel water instead of absorb it.I will definitely buy these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020
Author: Donna Luginbill
Title: Great towels
Body: I was very happy when these towels arrived.  I am always nervous to buy towels because I have gotten several towels that don‚Äôt absorb.  These are great.  The color was very pretty and just like the picture.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
Author: JustKelly
Title: Very nice quality cotton point!
Body: I ordered two sets of white. These towels are large, absorbent, and a heavy cotton pile. If you‚Äôre looking for a great set of towels at a good price point, these won‚Äôt disappoint. I plan to buy another set in the near future!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
Author: Britt Lee
Title: Supet soft, but leaves residue even after first wash
Body: Towels are super soft and absorbent; however, despite washing before use there was residue after drying off with them
Style: Color: Silver Grey | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
Author: Rachel Fix
Title: Company looking out
Body: Washed them once and they started coming apart.Update: when the company saw the review they offered to send more towels or a partial refund. I chose a replacement.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
Author: James Kirby
Title: Great purchase of very good quality towels!!
Body: These are very good quality towels, better even than expected. Highly absorbent, very soft and thick even after washing. Minimal lint found in the washer or dryer. These are as good as any hotel quality towels out there!! Bought 2 full sets, plus 4 bath sheets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
Author: Kathleen Wang
Title: Great value for higher quality

They're pretty soft and fluffy and I haven't had any issues with the quality - they towels are pretty sturdy and haven't had any pilling or loose threads. I wouldn't consider the towels luxury but more like mid-luxury, hence the four stars.Overall, happy with these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
Author: CatLady27
Title: Faded to yellow after  20 washings
Body: Can't recommend these towels. They are absorbent enough, however, after approx 20 washings, my sage green towels were light yellow. Ick! I never used bleach, just warm water and detergent. They faded very quickly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
Author: A. Perry
Title: Good Value
Body: The towels are not  luxurious, but are soft and the cost was economical.  They were washed upon arrival ...no fraying.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020
Author: Kathy L
Title: Frayed after two washings!
Body: The towels are a beautiful brown color. They are very soft, but not very absorbent. After two washings the sides have already pulled apart and are fraying. I wouldn‚Äôt purchase these again.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
Author: ChelleC
Title: Horrible quality
Body: Did not like these towels as soon as I received them I washed them and boy did they shed I was very disappointed. I used them anyway and was even more disappointed as I felt like I was not dry at all! Bad Bad Bad buy!
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
Author: MsTenisha
Title: Good value
Body: They aren‚Äôt hard once u wash them, I love the softness. They did start to unravel once they were washed once, a lot of stings hanging. Just needed some towels for guess, so I guess they will serve there purpose.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
Author: SB
Title: Fuzzies...lots of lint
Body: These towels would be great for the price, except for the amount of fuzz. I have washed them multiple times and they still have fuzzies stuck to them. You can pick the lint/fuzz off, but it doesn't come off in the dryer.
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2021
Author: J. Tucker
Title: Not a great product; can‚Äôt recommend.
Body: Color is beautiful and has stayed true through repeated washing, but the towels began to unravel pretty quickly. Unimpressed with the quality.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
Author: Joyce Howard
Title: Towels
Body: For the most part okayBut seems to pull more that any other towelsI probably would not buy again would buy a better quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
Author: Ajay
Title: Great
Body: Love this towel set, the thickness and absorbency is like no other towels i have.  They are very soft and they do not shed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
Author: Mz Dee
Title: These towels shred very horribly!
Body: These towels shred so bad that they almost ruined my washer and lots of clothes. I don't recommend buying these towels at all!
Style: Color: Choclate Brown | Item Package Quantity: 8

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
Author: DD Ames
Title: Great towels for the price
Body: I bought these because of the color and price and was nicely surprised with the quality.  I bought another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2019
Author: Idkwhattonamemyself
Title: Scratchy and pulled thread
Body: The towels are cheap towels. I don't know what I was expecting. Mine came and after one wash the threads along the edge one of the bath towels frayed. They also are not very soft towels but that is matter of personal preference.Edit: (2 stars to 4 stars)Customer service is outstanding. They saw my review and offered replacement towels. The replacement ones make me think the original set was a fluke. The towels are still not the softest but no pulled thread issues on the new set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
Author: Allie
Title: Lint on top of Lint!
Body: I washed all of the towels before use, but I noticed a lot of lint on my body as I was drying off. I washed them a second time and my lint trap was overwhelmed. The towels themselves looked and felt degraded too. Not worth it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
Author: SZ
Title: Great Towels for the price
Body: These are very nice. Purchased them for a guest bath and havent used them yet but I did wash them and they washed up well. No loose threads no puckering or odd shrinking. They color in the beige did not fade as in some other inexpensive towels I purchased at Costco.

Author: Lisa Orr
Title: Love My New Towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
Author: Andrew

Body: There is nothing good to say about these towels. They are paper thin and coarse. Do not waste your money. I‚Äôll be returning this item.

And when using the towels with drying off after a shower the lint falls into the tub and sticks to you.  I figured after a month of washing eventually it would end with the lint.  So my return window closed and now I know honestly what type of quality towels these are and they are not Premium Towels.  Not worth the money I paid.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
Author: Kenny355
Title: These never quit shedding or bleeding
Body: i purchased these in Burgundy for my guest bathroom. I washed them when i received them and hung them in the guest bathroom. The first guest that used them had to holler from the bathroom asking for another set of towels. She had to take a second shower to wash and rinse off the burgundy fuzz the towels left her covered with. I washed them again at the time, with some of my gray bath towels and they left them with burgundy fuzz and a pink tint. I washed them again, separate from anything else and put them in the guest bathroom again, and this weekend, same result. Fuzzy guest. I washed them one more time this morning and dried them only to get an overloaded lint filter. Yep, burgundy fuzz. These towels now reside in my trash container til it gets emptied on Tuesday. I'm shocked that suchan inferior product is actually put on the market, and would say this is the worst purchase I have made on Amazon. If you buy these, don't say you weren't warned.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
Author: Theresa Russell
Title: Fray and leave lint EVERYWHERE
Body: I wanted to love these towels. They were very soft when they first arrived. I washed them before my first use, as recommended. That's where the trouble started...My lint trap was FULL. I have an extra large dryer and put only 4 towels in. I haven't had new towels in awhile so I figured it was just a "first wash" thing.It wasn't. I've washed these towels SEVEN times now. Every time lint completely fills up the trap. They've become thin and frayed and yet they still manage to leave lint all over my body, my bathroom floors, just everywhere.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
Author: Elephanty88
Title: Wet. Wet. Wet!!!
Body: I got these as a gift from my mom. They honestly felt cheap when I opened them up. And I buy my stuff at Walmart. Washed and dried them. Used them after a shower and I'm covered in blue fuzz. And I was still wet! Yet the towel felt like it was submerged in a pool. I don't think I carry that much water out of the shower. These are the worst towels I've ever used. Now we use them for mundane stuff. Like covering the floor while changing a diaper or letting the kids do their art projects over them. Don't waste your money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Love these towels, soft and absorbent
Body: Have these now in our master bathroom, have washed them multiple times (yes, of course as with all new towels at first we got a lot of lint in the dryer), and they are great. Love the grey color. Ordered the brown for the guest bath, but have to return or use elsewhere - know that this is a very red-brown, not a dark brown. I so wish they had dark brown!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
Author: Pamela J Nabors
Title: Fade and get coarse fast!
Body: These towels really disappointed.  I bought for my son and daughter-in-law as a a Christmas gift and just a couple months later they changed color - faded and also got far less soft.  Since they have a new baby and use  Free & clear detergent it was definitely the towels.  Really disappointing!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
Author: Kayla
Title: Stay away, terrible quality
Body: Hopefully the company sees this review and can make a change or reach out to me. We got these as a gift and they have been absolutely terrible. They shed like nothing else and we‚Äôve washed them 3 times to try to get rid of the lint, only to have them fall apart on us. Literally. The strings are pulling apart and they actually are useless to us and just take up space now. I‚Äôve never written a bad review for something, but I‚Äôve never had this much of an issue with a product. Our washing and drying machine is actually clogged with the lint.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
Author: Bill O.
Title: Does not absorb water
Body: We got these as a gift but had to send them back.  They simply do not absorb water, and we felt wet still after "drying" off.  They are soft, but they failed the basic function of a towel: to make one dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
Author: EEJ
Title: Nice towels but they shed
Body: I was hoping for some really soft towels and these are fairly nice. A little scratchy at first, but if you use fabric softener, it helps a lot. The main issue I have is these towels shed. They like to leave little fuzzies on my body.
Style: Color: Light Blue | Item Package Quantity: 8

The second towel set is on its way to her now.
